comment: Dr. Zimmerman is a great professor. Class was fun and interesting and the projects are different and relatively easy. I would definitely take again.

Zimmerman is great. She is sweet and caring and cracks a few jokes every now and then. We only had two test all semester but simple projects that help your grade. She is up front with what she wants but it is not a handful of work. Would take her again!
ABSOLUTELY TAKE HER!  She is one of my favorite professors at KSU.  The way she teaches makes the information easy to learn.  She is also an easy grader.
